act:
816091 THE SIXTH SCHEDULE TO THE CONSTITUTION (AMENDMENT) ACT, 2003
NO. 44 OF 2003 [ 7th September, 2003.]
An Act further to amend the Constitution of India in its application to the State of Assam.
BE it enacted by Parliament in the Fifty- fourth Year of the Republic of India as follows:-
1483860 1Short title.- This Act may be called the Sixth Schedule to the Constitution (Amendment) Act, 2003.
